TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PageTheme extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the base class for a page theme, which is a collection of resources that are used to define a consistent look across pages and controls in a Web site. The page theme can be set through configuration or the page directive.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Page and control developers do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate>, <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkin>, or PageTheme classes directly. These classes are used by the ASP.NET parser and runtime to apply style sheet elements that are defined in ASP.NET themes and control skins files to pages and specific types of controls.
Page developers enable (or disable) page themes using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Theme%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> properties. For more information about page themes, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](../Topic/ASP.NET%20Themes%20and%20Skins.md).

MemberSignature.Value: protected PageTheme ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract string AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory { get; }
.property instance string AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory

Docs.summary: When overridden a derived class, gets the relative URL of the directory for the object.
Docs.value: A string value containing the relative URL of the directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory property is abstract. When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides the AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory property. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveUrl%2A> method uses the AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory property to resolves a relative URL to an absolute URL.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract System.Collections.IDictionary ControlSkins { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.IDictionary ControlSkins

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface of the names of all default skins that are available for the current page theme, indexed by control type.
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that represents the control skins associated with the current page theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ControlSkins property is abstract. When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object CreateSkinKey (Type controlType, string skinID);
.method public static hidebysig object CreateSkinKey(class System.Type controlType, string skinID) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.Type> of control to which a control skin applies, which is passed typically from the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ControlType%2A>.
The name of the control skin for which to create a key.
Docs.summary: Creates a lookup key object for a particular control type and skin ID.

MemberSignature.Value: protected object Eval (string expression);
.method familyhidebysig instance object Eval(string expression) cil managed

Docs.param: The navigation path from the container to the public property value. For details, see .
Docs.summary: Uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=fullName> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Page%2A> property that the instance of the class is associated with to evaluate a data-binding expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Eval%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the data item container.

A .NET Framework format string. For details, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.Eval%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the data item container.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract string[] LinkedStyleSheets { get; }
.property instance string[] LinkedStyleSheets

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of style sheets that are linked to this page.
Docs.value: A string array of style sheets linked to this page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The LinkedStyleSheets property is abstract and must be implemented in a derived class. When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.

MemberSignature.Value: protected System.Web.UI.Page Page { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.Page Page

Docs.summary: Gets the object that is associated with the instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Page property is read-only and is assigned internally when an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> class is created.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TestDeviceFilter (string deviceFilterName);
.method public hidebysig instance bool TestDeviceFilter(string deviceFilterName) cil managed

Docs.param: The string name of the device filter to check.
Docs.summary: Tests whether a device filter applies to the control that the instance of the class is associated with.
